monogr.author: Aeschylus
monogr.title: Aeschylus, with an English translation by Herbert Weir Smyth, Ph. D. in two volumes. 1.Persians

imprint.publisher: Cambridge, Mass., Harvard University Press; London, William Heinemann, Ltd.

respStmt.name: EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis

change.item: Text scanned at U. Chicago in 1988. Basic SGML tagging by EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis.
Final check of cardbreaks, tags, and linenumbers.
Compare with TLG text for missing words or other scanner omissions.
tagged corrupt words with the NOPARSE tag; see the text log for a list

$Log: aesch.pers_gk.xml,v $
Revision 1.1  2009-10-09 19:49:18  rsingh04
more reorganizing of texts module by collection

Revision 1.1  2009/10/07 20:59:53  rsingh04
began reorganizing texts module by collection.  created separate work directory in texts module to keep hopper files separate from in progress files

Revision 1.3  2005/08/01 15:44:56  packel
really removed item tags

Revision 1.2  2005/08/01 15:32:41  packel
removed stray item tags

Revision 1.1  2005/07/25 14:27:20  packel
Converted to XML

Revision 1.8  2004/04/21 20:28:10  mimno
added card 1s

Revision 1.7  2003/07/01 22:14:25  yorkc
Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)

Revision 1.6  2000/03/04 20:33:49  dasmith
Added separate funder entity to TEI header.

Revision 1.5  2000/02/17 17:46:03  amahoney
use n on sp for speeches interrupted by cardbreaks;  put cards at ends of
such speeches after the close tag;  put sp and speaker tags on the divs
of the choruses, which were not marked at all (but div2 closes sp, so
we lost the speaker info)

Revision 1.4  1999/12/23 18:19:40  amahoney
convert to P3

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: kou)/te tis a)/ggelos ou)/te tis i(ppeu\s
prolipo/ntes e)/ban, toi\ me\n e)f' i(/ppwn.
toi\ d' e)pi\ naw=n, pezoi/ te ba/dhn
foberoi\ me\n i)dei=n, deinoi\ de\ ma/xhn
a)/llous d' o( me/gas kai\ poluqre/mmwn
to\ maxairofo/ron t' e)/qnos e)k pa/shs

l.#text: bussi/nois d' e)n pe/plois pe/sh| laki/s.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: qeou= me\n eu)na/teira *persw=n, qeou= de\ kai\ mh/thr e)/fus,
ei)/ ti mh\ dai/mwn palaio\s nu=n meqe/sthke stratw=|.

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
l: tau=ta dh\ lipou=s' i(ka/nw xruseosto/lmous do/mous

l.#text: kai\ to\ *darei/ou te ka)mo\n koino\n eu)nath/rion.

l: ka)me\ kardi/an a)mu/ssei fronti/s:  e)s d' u(ma=s e)rw=
mu=qon ou)damw=s e)mauth=s ou)=s' a)dei/mantos, fi/loi,
mh\ me/gas plou=tos koni/sas ou)=das a)ntre/yh| podi\
o)/lbon, o(\n *darei=os h)=ren ou)k a)/neu qew=n tinos.

l.#text: tau=ta/ moi diplh= me/rimna frasto/s e)stin e)n fresi/n,

l: mh/te xrhma/twn a)na/ndrwn plh=qos e)n timh=| se/bein
mh/t' a)xrhma/toisi la/mpein fw=s o(/son sqe/nos pa/ra.
e)/sti ga\r plou=to/s g' a)memfh/s, a)mfi\ d' o)fqalmw=| fo/bos:
o)/mma ga\r do/mwn nomi/zw despo/tou parousi/an.

l.#text: pro\s ta/d' w(s ou(/tws e)xo/ntwn tw=nde, su/mbouloi lo/gou

l: pa/nta ga\r ta\ ke/dn' e)n u(mi=n e)sti/ moi bouleu/mata.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: eu)= to/d' i)/sqi, gh=s a)/nassa th=sde, mh/ se di\s fra/sai
mh/t' e)/pos mh/t' e)/rgon w(=n a)\n du/namis h(gei=sqai qe/lh|:

l.#text: eu)menei=s ga\r o)/ntas h(ma=s tw=nde sumbou/lous kalei=s.

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
l: cu/neim', a)f' ou(=per pai=s e)mo\s stei/las strato\n
a)ll' ou)/ti pw toio/nd' e)narge\s ei)do/mhn

l.#text: w(s th=s pa/roiqen eu)fro/nhs: le/cw de/ soi.

l: h( d' au)=te *dwrikoi=sin, ei)s o)/yin molei=n,
mege/qei te tw=n nu=n e)kprepesta/ta polu/,

l.#text: ka/llei t' a)mw/mw, kai\ kasignh/ta ge/nous

l: tau)tou=: pa/tran d' e)/naion h( me\n *(ella/da
klh/rw| laxou=sa gai=an, h( de\ ba/rbaron.
tou/tw sta/sin tin', w(s e)gw\ 'do/koun o(ra=n,
teu/xein e)n a)llh/laisi: pai=s d' e)mo\s maqw\n
zeu/gnusin au)tw\ kai\ le/padn' e)p' au)xe/nwn
ti/qhsi.  xh) me\n th=|d' e)purgou=to stolh=|
e)n h(ni/aisi/ t' ei)=xen eu)/arkton sto/ma,
h( d' e)sfa/daze, kai\ xeroi=n e)/nth di/frou
a)/neu xalinw=n kai\ zugo\n qrau/ei me/son.
pi/ptei d' e)mo\s pai=s, kai\ path\r pari/statai
*darei=os oi)ktei/rwn sfe: to\n d' o(/pws o(ra=|

l.#text: kai\ tau=ta me\n dh\ nukto\s ei)sidei=n le/gw.

l: e)pei\ d' a)ne/sthn kai\ xeroi=n kallirro/ou
qe/lousa qu=sai pe/lanon, w(=n te/lh ta/de.

l.#text: o(rw= de\ feu/gont' ai)eto\n pro\s e)sxa/ran

l: ti/llonq': o( d' ou)de\n a)/llo g' h)\ pth/cas de/mas
u(mi=n d' a)kou/ein.  eu)= ga\r i)/ste, pai=s e)mo\s
pra/cas me\n eu)= qaumasto\s a)\n ge/noit' a)nh/r,
kakw=s de\ pra/cas, ou)x u(peu/qunos po/lei,
swqei\s d' o(moi/ws th=sde koiranei= xqono/s.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s

l.#text: ou)/ se boulo/mesqa, mh=ter, ou)/t' a)/gan fobei=n lo/gois

l: ou)/te qarsu/nein. qeou\s de\ prostropai=s i(knoume/nh,
ei)/ ti flau=ron ei)=des, ai)tou= tw=nd' a)potroph\n telei=n,
ta\ d' a)ga/q' e)ktelh= gene/sqai soi/ te kai\ te/knois se/qen
kai\ po/lei fi/lois te pa=si.  deu/teron de\ xrh\ xoa\s

l.#text: *gh=| te kai\ fqitoi=s xe/asqai: preumenw=s d' ai)tou= ta/de,

l: so\n po/sin *darei=on, o(/nper fh\s i)dei=n kat' eu)fro/nhn,
e)sqla/ soi pe/mpein te/knw| te gh=s e)/nerqen e)s fa/os,
ta)/mpalin de\ tw=nde gai/a| ka/toxa maurou=sqai sko/tw|.
tau=ta qumo/mantis w)/n soi preumenw=s parh/|nesa.

l.#text: eu)= de\ pantaxh=| telei=n soi tw=nde kri/nomen pe/ri.

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
l: a)lla\ mh\n eu)/nous g' o( prw=tos tw=nd' e)nupni/wn krith\s
paidi\ kai\ do/mois e)moi=si th/nd' e)ku/rwsas fa/tin.
e)kteloi=to dh\ ta\ xrhsta/: tau=ta d', w(s e)fi/esai,
pa/nta qh/somen qeoi=si toi=s t' e)/nerqe gh=s fi/lois,

l.#text: eu)=t' a)\n ei)s oi)/kous mo/lwmen.  kei=na  d' e)kmaqei=n qe/lw,

l: w)= fi/loi, pou= ta\s *)aqh/nas fasi\n i(dru=sqai xqono/s.

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
sp.l: a)lla\ mh\n i(/meir' e)mo\s pai=s th/nde qhra=sai po/lin;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: pa=sa ga\r ge/noit' a)\n *(ella\s basile/ws u(ph/koos.

l.#text: w(=de/ tis pa/restin au)toi=s a)ndroplh/qeia stratou=;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai\ strato\s toiou=tos, e)/rcas polla\ dh\ *mh/dous kaka/.

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
sp.l: kai\ ti/ pro\s tou/toisin a)/llo; plou=tos e)carkh\s do/mois;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)rgu/rou phgh/ tis au)toi=s e)sti, qhsauro\s xqono/s.

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
sp.l: po/tera ga\r tocoulko\s ai)xmh\ dia\ xeroi=n au)toi=s pre/pei;

l.#text: ou)damw=s: e)/gxh stadai=a kai\ fera/spides sagai/.

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
sp.l: ti/s de\ poima/nwr e)/pesti ka)pidespo/zei stratw=|;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ou)/tinos dou=loi ke/klhntai fwto\s ou)d' u(ph/kooi.

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
sp.l: pw=s a)\n ou)=n me/noien a)/ndras polemi/ous e)ph/ludas;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: w(/ste *darei/ou polu/n te kai\ kalo\n fqei=rai strato/n.

l.#text: deina/ toi le/geis i)o/ntwn toi=s tekou=si fronti/sai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: a)ll' e)moi\ dokei=n ta/x' ei)/sh| pa/nta nhmerth= lo/gon.
tou=de ga\r dra/mhma fwto\s *persiko\n pre/pei maqei=n,
kai\ fe/rei safe/s ti pra=gos e)sqlo\n h)\ kako\n klu/ein.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos

l.#text: w)= *persi\s ai)=a kai\ polu\s plou/tou limh/n,

l: w(s e)n mia=| plhgh=| kate/fqartai polu\s
o)/lbos, to\ *persw=n d' a)/nqos oi)/xetai peso/n.
w)/moi, kako\n me\n prw=ton a)gge/llein kaka/:
o(/mws d' a)na/gkh pa=n a)naptu/cai pa/qos,

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos

l.#text: w(s pa/nta g' e)/st' e)kei=na diapepragme/na:

l: au)to\s d' a)e/lptws no/stimon ble/pw fa/os.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
l: kai\ mh\n parw/n ge kou) lo/gous a)/llwn klu/wn,

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
l: ou)de\n ga\r h)/rkei to/ca, pa=s d' a)pw/lluto

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
l: to\ mh/te le/cai mh/t' e)rwth=sai pa/qh.
o(/mws d' a)na/gkh phmona\s brotoi=s fe/rein
qew=n dido/ntwn: pa=n d' a)naptu/cas pa/qos

l.#text: le/con katasta/s, kei) ste/neis kakoi=s o(/mws.

l: ti/s ou) te/qnhke, ti/na de\ kai\ penqh/somen

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: *ce/rchs me\n au)to\s zh=| te kai\ ble/pei fa/os.

sp.speaker: *)/atossa

l.#text: e)moi=s me\n ei)=pas dw/masin fa/os me/ga

l: kai\ leuko\n h)=mar nukto\s e)k melagxi/mou.

l.#text: kei=tai qanw\n dei/laios ou) ma/l'  eu)tuxw=s:
pollw=n paro/ntwn d' o)li/g'  a)pagge/llw kaka/.

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
l: ai)ai=, kakw=n u(/yista dh\ klu/w ta/de,
a)ta\r fra/son moi tou=t' a)nastre/yas pa/lin:

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
l: plh/qous me\n a)\n sa/f' i)/sq' e(/kati ba/rbaron
nausi\n krath=sai.  kai\ ga\r *(/ellhsin me\n h)=n
o( pa=s a)riqmo\s e)s triaka/das de/ka

l.#text: naw=n, deka\s d' h)=n tw=nde xwri\s e)/kkritos:

l: *ce/rch| de/, kai\ ga\r oi)=da, xilia\s me\n h)=n
w(=n h)=ge plh=qos, ai( d' u(pe/rkopoi ta/xei
e(kato\n di\s h)=san e(pta/ q': w(=d' e)/xei lo/gos.
mh/ soi dokou=men th=|de leifqh=nai ma/xh|;

l.#text: a)ll' w(=de dai/mwn tis kate/fqeire strato/n,

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: a)ndrw=n ga\r o)/ntwn e(/rkos e)sti\n a)sfale/s.

sp.speaker: *)/atossa

l.#text: a)rxh\ de\ nausi\ sumbolh=s ti/s h)=n, fra/son:

l: h)\ pai=s e)mo/s, plh/qei katauxh/sas new=n;

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
l: h)=rcen me/n, w)= de/spoina, tou= panto\s kakou=
fanei\s a)la/stwr h)\ kako\s dai/mwn poqe/n.
w(s ei) melai/nhs nukto\s i(/cetai kne/fas,
o( d' eu)qu\s w(s h)/kousen, ou) cunei\s do/lon
eu)=t' a)\n fle/gwn a)kti=sin h(/lios xqo/na

l.#text: lh/ch|, kne/fas de\ te/menos ai)qe/ros la/bh|,

l: ta/cai new=n sti=fos me\n e)n stoi/xois trisi\n
tosau=t' e)/lece ka/rq' u(p' eu)qu/mou freno/s:
ou) ga\r to\ me/llon e)k qew=n h)pi/stato.
oi( d' ou)k a)ko/smws, a)lla\ peiqa/rxw| freni\

l.#text: dei=pno/n t'  e)porsu/nonto, nauba/ths t'  a)nh\r

l: kai\ nu\c e)ph/|ei, pa=s a)nh\r kw/phs a)/nac
e)s nau=n e)xw/rei pa=s q' o(/plwn e)pista/ths:

l.#text: ta/cis de\ ta/cin pareka/lei new\s makra=s:

l: ple/ousi d' w(s e(/kastos h)=n tetagme/nos,
kai\ nu\c e)xw/rei, kou) ma/l' *(ellh/nwn strato\s
h)xw/: fo/bos de\ pa=si barba/rois parh=n
gnw/mhs a)posfalei=sin: ou) ga\r w(s fugh=|
a)ll' e)s ma/xhn o(rmw=ntes eu)yu/xw| qra/sei:

l.#text: sa/lpigc d' a)u+th=| pa/nt' e)kei=n' e)pe/flegen.

l: qow=s de\ pa/ntes h)=san e)kfanei=s i)dei=n.
to\ decio\n me\n prw=ton eu)ta/ktws ke/ras

l.#text: h(gei=to ko/smw|, deu/teron d' o( pa=s sto/los

l: pai=das, gunai=kas, qew=n te/ patrw/|wn e(/dh,

l.#text: qh/kas te progo/nwn: nu=n u(pe\r pa/ntwn a)gw/n.

l: kai\ mh\n par' h(mw=n *persi/dos glw/sshs r(o/qos
eu)qu\s de\ nau=s e)n nhi\ xalkh/rh sto/lon
ko/rumb', e)p' a)/llhn d' a)/llos hu)/qunen do/ru.
ta\ prw=ta me/n nun r(eu=ma *persikou= stratou=
a)ntei=xen: w(s de\ plh=qos e)n stenw=| new=n
h)/qroist' a)rwgh\ d' ou)/tis a)llh/lois parh=n,

l.#text: au)toi\ d' u(f' au(tw=n e)mbo/lois xalkosto/mois

l: ska/fh new=n, qa/lassa d' ou)ke/t' h)=n i)dei=n,
a)ktai\ de\ nekrw=n xoira/des t' e)plh/quon,
fugh=| d' a)ko/smw| pa=sa nau=s h)re/sseto,
toi\ d' w(/ste qu/nnous h)/ tin' i)xqu/wn bo/lon
kakw=n de\ plh=qos, ou)d' a)\n ei) de/k' h)/mata
eu)= ga\r to/d' i)/sqi, mhda/m' h(me/ra| mia=|

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
l: ai)ai=, kakw=n dh\ pe/lagos e)/rrwgen me/ga

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos

l.#text: eu)= nun to/d' i)/sqi, mhde/pw mesou=n kako/n:

l: toia/d' e)p' au)toi=s h)=lqe sumfora\ pa/qous
w(s toi=sde kai\ di\s a)ntishkw=sai r(oph=|.

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
l: kai\ ti/s ge/noit' a)\n th=sd' e)/t' e)xqi/wn tu/xh;
le/con ti/n' au)= fh\s th/nde sumfora\n stratw=|

l.#text: e)lqei=n kakw=n r(e/pousan e)s ta\ ma/ssona.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
l: au)tw=| t' a)/nakti pi/stin e)n prw/tois a)ei/,

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
l: poi/w| mo/rw| de\ tou/sde fh\s o)lwle/nai;

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
l: baia/, du/sormos nausi/n, h(\n o( filo/xoros

l.#text: e)ntau=qa pe/mpei tou/sd', o(/pws, o(/tan new=n

l: kakw=s to\ me/llon i(storw=n. w(s ga\r qeo\s
o(/poi tra/pointo.  polla\ me\n ga\r e)k xerw=n
te/los d' e)formhqe/ntes e)c e(no\s r(o/qou
e(/dran ga\r ei)=xe panto\s eu)agh= stratou=,

l.#text: i(/hs'  a)ko/smw| cu\n fugh=|.  toia/nde soi

l: pro\s th=| pa/roiqe sumfora\n pa/ra ste/nein.

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
l: w)= stugne\ dai=mon, w(s a)/r' e)/yeusas frenw=n
w(=n a)nti/poina pai=s e)mo\s pra/cein dokw=n
su\ d' ei)pe/, naw=n ai(\ pefeu/gasin mo/ron,
pou= ta/sd' e)/leipes: oi)=sqa shmh=nai torw=s;

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos

l.#text: naw=n ge tagoi\ tw=n leleimme/nwn su/dhn

l: kat' ou)=ron ou)k eu)/kosmon ai)/rontai fugh/n:
strato\s d' o( loipo\s e)/n te *boiwtw=n xqoni\
diw/lluq', oi( me\n a)mfi\ krhnai=on ga/nos
di/yh| ponou=ntes, oi( d' u(p' a)/sqmatos kenoi\
di/yh| te limw=| t': a)mfo/tera ga\r h)=n ta/de.

l.#text: *)hdwni/d' ai)=an: nukti\ d'  e)n tau/th| qeo\s

l: xeimw=n' a)/wron w)=rse, ph/gnusin de\ pa=n
to\ pri\n nomi/zwn ou)damou= to/t' hu)/xeto
xw)/stis me\n h(mw=n pri\n skedasqh=nai qeou=
fle/gwn ga\r au)gai=s lampro\s h(li/ou ku/klos
pi=pton d' e)p' a)llh/loisin: hu)tu/xei de/ toi
e)f' e(stiou=xon gai=an: w(s ste/nein po/lin
tau=t' e)/st' a)lhqh=: polla\ d' e)klei/pw le/gwn

l.#text: w)= duspo/nhte dai=mon, w(s a)/gan baru\s

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
l: w(s ka/rta moi safw=s e)dh/lwsas kaka/.

l.#text: u(mei=s de\ fau/lws au)/t'  a)/gan e)kri/nate.

l: o(/mws d', e)peidh\ th=|d' e)ku/rwsen fa/tis
u(mw=n, qeoi=s me\n prw=ton eu)/casqai qe/lw:
h(/cw labou=sa pe/lanon e)c oi)/kwn e)mw=n,
a)ll' e)s to\ loipo\n ei)/ ti dh\ lw=|on pe/loi.
u(ma=s de\ xrh\ 'pi\ toi=sde toi=s pepragme/nois
kai\ pai=d', e)a/n per deu=r' e)mou= pro/sqen mo/lh|,
mh\ kai/ ti pro\s kakoi=si prosqh=tai kako/n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: nu=n ga\r dh\ pro/pasa me\n ste/nei  gai='

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
l: fi/loi, kakw=n me\n o(/stis e)/mpeiros  kurei=,
o(/tan d' o( dai/mwn eu)roh=|,  pepoiqe/nai
to\n au)to\n ai)ei\ dai/mon' ou)riei=n tu/xhn.
e)moi\  ga\r h)/dh pa/nta me\n fo/bou ple/a

l.#text: boa=| d' e)n w)si\ ke/lados ou)  paiw/nios:
toiga\r ke/leuqon th/nd'  a)/neu t' o)xhma/twn

l: xlidh=s te th=s pa/roiqen e)k do/mwn  pa/lin
boo/s t' a)f' a(gnh=s leuko\n  eu)/poton ga/la,
th=s t' a)nqemourgou= sta/gma, pamfae\s me/li,
th=s t' ai)e\n e)n fu/lloisi qallou/shs  bi/on
a)/nqh te plekta/, pamfo/rou gai/as  te/kna,

l.#text: a)ll', w)= fi/loi, xoai=si tai=sde nerte/rwn

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: su/ te pe/mpe xoa\s  qala/mous u(po\ gh=s,
ei) ga/r ti kakw=n a)/kos oi)=de ple/on,

l.#text: a)lla\ su/ moi *ga= te kai\  a)/lloi

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: peri\ ta=| sa=| di/duma  diago/en  a(ma/rtia;

sp.speaker: *ei)/dwlon  *darei/ou
l: w)= pista\ pistw=n h(/like/s q' h(/bhs e)mh=s
leu/sswn d' a)/koitin th\n e)mh\n ta/fou  pe/las
u(mei=s de\ qrhnei=t' e)ggu\s e(stw=tes ta/fou
oi)ktrw=s kalei=sqe/ m': e)sti\ d' ou)k eu)e/codon,
a)/llws  te pa/ntws xoi) kata\ xqono\s qeoi\
h(/kw. ta/xune d' w(s a)/memptos w)= xro/nou.

sp.speaker: *darei=os
l: a)ll' e)pei\ ka/twqen h)=lqon soi=s go/ois  pepeisme/nos,
mh/ ti makisth=ra mu=qon, a)lla\ su/ntomon le/gwn
ei)pe\ kai\ pe/raine  pa/nta, th\n e)mh\n ai)dw=  meqei/s.

sp.speaker: *darei=os
l: a)ll' e)pei\ de/os palaio\n soi\ frenw=n a)nqi/statai,
tw=n  e)mw=n le/ktrwn geraia\ cu/nnom' eu)gene\s gu/nai,

l.#text: klauma/twn lh/casa tw=nde kai\ go/wn safe/s ti/ moi

l: le/con:  a)nqrw/peia d' a)/n toi ph/mat' a)\n tu/xoi  brotoi=s.
polla\ me\n ga\r e)k qala/sshs, polla\ d' e)k xe/rsou kaka\
gi/gnetai qnhtoi=s, o( ma/sswn bi/otos h)\n  taqh=|, pro/sw.

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
l: w)= brotw=n pa/ntwn u(persxw\n o)/lbon eu)tuxei= po/tmw|

l.#text: w(s e(/ws t' e)/leusses  au)ga\s h(li/ou zhlwto\s w)\n

l: nu=n te/ se zhlw= qano/nta, pri\n kakw=n i)dei=n  ba/qos.
pa/nta ga/r, *darei=' a)kou/sh| mu=qon e)n braxei= xro/nw|.
diapepo/rqhtai ta\ *persw=n pra/gmaq',  w(s ei)pei=n e)/pos.

l.#text: ti/ni tro/pw|; loimou= tis h)=lqe skhpto\s h)\ sta/sis  po/lei;

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
sp.l: ou)damw=s:  a)ll' a)mf' *)aqh/nas pa=s kate/fqartai strato/s.

sp.speaker: *darei=os
sp.l: ti/s d' e)mw=n e)kei=se pai/dwn e)strathla/tei;  fra/son.

sp.speaker: *darei=os
sp.l: pezo\s h)\ nau/ths de\ pei=ran th/nd' e)mw/ranen  ta/las;

l.#text: a)mfo/tera: diplou=n me/twpon h)=n duoi=n strateuma/toin.

sp.speaker: *darei=os
sp.l: pw=s de\ kai\ strato\s toso/sde pezo\s h)/nusen pera=n;

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
sp.l: mhxanai=s e)/zeucen *(/ellhs porqmo/n, w(/st' e)/xein po/ron.

sp.speaker: *darei=os
sp.l: kai\ to/d' e)ce/pracen, w(/ste *bo/sporon klh=|sai me/gan:

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
sp.l: w(=d' e)/xei: gnw/mhs de/ pou/ tis daimo/nwn  cunh/yato.

l.#text: feu=, me/gas tis h)=lqe dai/mwn, w(/ste mh\ fronei=n  kalw=s.

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
sp.l: w(s i)dei=n te/los pa/restin oi(=on h)/nusen  kako/n.

sp.speaker: *darei=os
sp.l: kai\ ti/ dh\ pra/casin au)toi=s w(=d'  e)pistena/zete;

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
sp.l: nautiko\s strato\s kakwqei\s pezo\n w)/lese  strato/n.

sp.speaker: *darei=os
sp.l: w(=de pamph/dhn de\ lao\s pa=s kate/fqartai  dori/;

l.#text: pro\s ta/d' w(s *sou/swn me\n a)/stu pa=n kenandri/an  ste/nei.

sp.speaker: *darei=os
sp.l: w)= po/poi kednh=s a)rwgh=s ka)pikouri/as  stratou=.

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
sp.l: *baktri/wn d' e)/rrei panw/lhs dh=mos, ou)de/ tis  ge/rwn.

sp.speaker: *darei=os
sp.l: w)= me/leos, oi(/an a)/r' h(/bhn cumma/xwn  a)pw/lesen.

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
sp.l: mona/da de\ *ce/rchn e)/rhmo/n fasin ou) pollw=n  me/ta

l.#text: pw=s te dh\ kai\ poi= teleuta=n; e)/sti tis swthri/a;

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
sp.l: a)/smenon molei=n ge/furan gai=n duoi=n zeukthri/an.

sp.speaker: *darei=os
sp.l: kai\ pro\s h)/peiron sesw=sqai th/nde, tou=t'  e)th/tumon;

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
sp.l: nai/:  lo/gos  kratei=  safhnh\s  tou=to/  g',  ou)d'    e)/ni  sta/sis.

sp.speaker: *darei=os
l: feu=, taxei=a/ g' h)=lqe xrhsmw=n pra=cis, e)s de\ pai=d' e)mo\n

l.#text: *zeu\s a)pe/skhyen  teleuth\n qesfa/twn: e)gw\ de/ pou

l: dia\ makrou= xro/nou ta/d' hu)/xoun  e)kteleuth/sein qeou/s:
a)ll' o(/tan speu/dh| tis au)to/s, xw) qeo\s  suna/ptetai.
nu=n kakw=n e)/oike phgh\ pa=sin hu(rh=sqai  fi/lois.
pai=s d' e)mo\s ta/d' ou) kateidw\s h)/nusen ne/w| qra/sei:
kai\ po/ron meterru/qmize, kai\ pe/dais  sfurhla/tois
peribalw\n pollh\n ke/leuqon h)/nusen pollw=| stratw=|,
qnhto\s w)\n  qew=n te pa/ntwn w)/|et', ou)k eu)bouli/a|,

l.#text: kai\  *poseidw=nos krath/sein. pw=s ta/d' ou) no/sos frenw=n

l: ei)=xe pai=d' e)mo/n; de/doika  mh\ polu\s plou/tou po/nos
ou(mo\s a)nqrw/pois ge/nhtai tou= fqa/santos a(rpagh/.

sp.speaker: *)/atossa
l: tau=ta/ toi kakoi=s o(milw=n a)ndra/sin  dida/sketai
qou/rios *ce/rchs: le/gousi d' w(s su\ me\n  me/gan te/knois

l.#text: plou=ton e)kth/sw cu\n  ai)xmh=|, to\n d' a)nandri/as u(/po

l: e)/ndon ai)xma/zein, patrw=|on d'  o)/lbon ou)de\n au)ca/nein.
toia/d' e)c a)ndrw=n o)nei/dh polla/kis  klu/wn kakw=n
th/nd' e)bou/leusen ke/leuqon kai\ stra/teum' e)f' *(ella/da.

sp.speaker: *darei=os
l: e)c ou(=te timh\n *zeu\s a)/nac th/nd' w)/pasen,

l.#text: *mh=dos ga\r h)=n o( prw=tos h(gemw\n stratou=:

l: a)/llos d' e)kei/nou pai=s to/d' e)/rgon  h)/nusen:
tri/tos d'  a)p' au)tou= *ku=ros, eu)dai/mwn a)nh/r,
qeo\s ga\r ou)k h)/xqhren,  w(s eu)/frwn e)/fu.

l.#text: qro/noisi/ t' a)rxai/oisi: to\n de\ su\n do/lw|

l: cu\n a)ndra/sin fi/loisin, oi(=s to/d' h)=n  xre/os.
ka)gw\ pa/lou t'  e)/kursa tou=per h)/qelon,
a)ll' ou) kako\n toso/nde prose/balon po/lei.
*ce/rchs  d' e)mo\s pai=s w)\n ne/os ne/a fronei=,
eu)= ga\r safw=s to/d' i)/st', e)moi\ cunh/likes,

l.#text: a(/pantes h(mei=s, oi(\ kra/th ta/d' e)/sxomen,

l: ou)k a)\n  fanei=men ph/mat' e)/rcantes  to/sa.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: lo/gwn  teleuth/n; pw=s a)\n e)k tou/twn e)/ti

sp.speaker: *darei=os

l.#text: ei) mh\ strateu/oisq' e)s to\n *(ellh/nwn  to/pon,

l: au)th\ ga\r  h( gh= cu/mmaxos kei/nois  pe/lei.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: pw=s tou=t' e)/lecas, ti/ni tro/pw| de\  summaxei=;

l.#text: a)ll' eu)stalh=  toi lekto\n a)rou=men sto/lon.

sp.speaker: *darei=os
l: a)ll' ou)d' o( mei/nas nu=n e)n *(ella/dos to/pois

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: pw=s ei)=pas; ou) ga\r pa=n stra/teuma barba/rwn

sp.speaker: *darei=os

l.#text: pau=roi ge pollw=n, ei)/ ti pisteu=sai  qew=n

l: xrh\ qesfa/toisin, e)s ta\ nu=n pepragme/na
ble/yanta: sumbai/nei ga\r  ou) ta\ me/n, ta\ d' ou)/.
kei)/per ta/d' e)sti/, plh=qos e)/kkriton  stratou=
ou(= sfin kakw=n u(/yist' e)pamme/nei  paqei=n,
oi(\ gh=n molo/ntes  *(ella/d' ou) qew=n bre/th
bwmoi\ d' a)/istoi, daimo/nwn q'  i(dru/mata
pa/sxousi, ta\ de\ me/llousi, kou)de/pw  kakw=n
qi=nes nekrw=n de\ kai\ tritospo/rw|  gonh=|

l.#text: w(s ou)x u(pe/rfeu qnhto\n o)/nta xrh\ fronei=n.

l: su\ d', w)= geraia\ mh=ter h( *ce/rcou fi/lh,
e)lqou=s' e)s  oi)/kous ko/smon o(/stis eu)preph\s

l.#text: kakw=n u(p' a)/lgous laki/des  a)mfi\ sw/mati

l: a)ll' au)to\n eu)fro/nws su\  pra/unon lo/gois:
mo/nhs ga/r, oi)=da, sou= klu/wn a)ne/cetai.
e)gw\ d' a)/peimi  gh=s u(po\ zo/fon ka/tw.

l.#text: u(mei=s de/, pre/sbeis,  xai/ret', e)n kakoi=s o(/mws

l: w(s toi=s qanou=si plou=tos ou)de\n  w)felei=.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: h)= polla\ kai\ paro/nta kai\ me/llont' e)/ti

sp.speaker: *)/atossa

l.#text: w)= dai=mon, w(/s me po/ll'  e)se/rxetai kaka\

l: a)/lgh, ma/lista d' h(/de sumfora\  da/knei,
a)ll' ei)=mi, kai\ labou=sa ko/smon e)k do/mwn
ou) ga\r ta\ fi/ltat' e)n  kakoi=s  prodw/somen.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: w)= po/poi h)= mega/las a)gaqa=s te po-

sp.speaker: *ce/rchs
l: du/sqroon au)da/n.    dai/mwn ga\r o(/d' au)=

sp.speaker: *ce/rchs
l: pw=s d'  ou)/;  strato\n me\n tosou=-

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/ d' ou)/k; o)/lwlen mega/lws ta\  *persa=n.

sp.speaker: *ce/rchs
sp.l: o(ra=|s to\ loipo\n to/de ta=s e)ma=s  stola=s;

l.#text: pe/plon d' e)pe/rrhc' e)pi\  sumfora=|  kakou=.

sp.speaker: *ce/rchs
sp.l: kai\ ple/on h)\ papai= me\n  ou)=n.

sp.speaker: *ce/rchs
sp.l: di/aine di/aine ph=ma:   pro\s do/mous d'  i)/qi.

sp.speaker: *ce/rchs
sp.l: e)/ress' e)/resse kai\   ste/naz' e)mh\n  xa/rin.

sp.speaker: *ce/rchs
sp.l: kai/ moi genei/ou pe/rqe leukh/rh  tri/xa.

l.#text: pe/plon d' e)/reike kolpi/an  a)kmh=| xerw=n.

sp.speaker: *ce/rchs
sp.l: kai\ ya/ll' e)/qeiran kai\ katoi/ktisai  strato/n.
